description:
Steam irons are made up of two halves, one is the water chamber and the other is the heating element. When the iron is used, steam passes through a vent that releases into the cloth, which moistens it and provides some heat. The heat causes the creases to release from the fabric. Steam irons can also be used for removing wrinkles from garments or fabrics.

The working of a steam iron is done by the heating element which heats up to the required temperature when water enters the chamber. The temperature can be adjusted as per requirement and because of this adjustment, it only takes a few minutes to remove wrinkles from clothes. Also known as dry irons or non-steam irons, they work on electricity and need to be plugged in.

Your clothing is what defines you. But who has the time to spend hours ironing shirts, pants, and dresses? We have just what you need with our amazing line of steam irons! To get the best clean with techvisionelectronics innovative, multifunctional products you need to look no further. We are proud of the diverse range and dedicated customer service we provide.
